title: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Review - The Best GTX 960 Replacement Yet?
description: The NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 is an affordable $220 graphics card that's supposed to be the best option yet for budget 1080P gaming.  But is it priced too high in comparison to the GTX 1660 Ti to make it a great gaming performance replacement for people who are still using a GTX 960?       Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  EVGA GTX 1660 Stock: TBD EVGA GTX 1660 XC Ultra:  TBD EVGA GTX 1660 Ti Black:   MSI GTX 1660 Ti Gaming X:    Enermax TR4 Cooler:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by EVGA. This video is sponsored by Enermax. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #gtx1660 #nvidia #gtx1660review #hardwarecanucks
